text: John Weeks (1941 â€“ 26 July 2020) was an American economist. He was born in Austin, Texas. He was Professor Emeritus at the School of Oriental and African Studies of the University of London. His research interests were in theoretical and policy-applied macroeconomics and economic development. He published academic papers, books and policy reports in these areas.SOAS staff listing Retrieved 14 September 2010 He died on 26 July 2020, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American economists Category:Educators from Austin, Texas Category:Writers from Austin, Texas
title: John Weeks (economist)
